description: Multi-strategy agent orchestration library for Python. Define pipelines with decorators, control flow with exceptions, run locally or distributed.
rules: Always use async functions for agents
Use Terminate(result) to stop pipeline and return
Use Handover(agent_name, data) to transfer control
Use Pydantic models for type-safe data flow
Choose strategy based on use case: SEQUENTIAL for pipelines, SELECTOR for routing, GRAPH for workflows, ROUND_ROBIN for iteration
